text:
Which is weird because aliens
don't need babysitters.

In fact, they should be
babysitting humans.

Because aliens are more superior
to humans in every single way.

Don't you have homework to do,
Jeremy?

- Aww.
- I don't sound like that.

The all new series "Gabby Duran
& the Unsittables,"

premieres Friday, October 11
on Disney Channel.
